alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Murray (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 10:41PM CDT until April 19 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca affecting Cottonwood and Murray Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca.late this evening * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 1426.0 feet, significant amounts of crop and pasture land are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 1425.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 PM CDT Friday was 1425.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 1425.8 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 1425.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue West Fork Des Moines River Avoca 1425.0 1425.7 Fri 10 pm 1425. 1425. 1425. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late Saturday morning.
